functions.tag: {CustomModelData:13,display:{Name:'{"text":"Stormbringer\'s Retribution","color":"blue","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"This trident is an incredibly powerful weapon","italic":false}','{"text":"that can be utilized with great effectiveness in close combat,","italic":false}','{"text":"similar to a sword.","italic":false}','{"text":"Furthermore, it possesses the remarkable ability","italic":false}','{"text":"to return to the wielder when thrown.","italic":false}','{"text":" "}','{"translate":"item.modifiers.mainhand","color":"gray","italic":false}','[{"text":" 12 ","color":"dark_green","italic":false},{"translate":"attribute.name.generic.attack_damage","color":"dark_green","italic":false}]','[{"text":" 1.6 ","color":"dark_green","italic":false},{"translate":"attribute.name.generic.attack_speed","color":"dark_green","italic":false}]']},HideFlags:3,RepairCost:40,Unbreakable:1b,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:channeling",lvl:1s},{id:"minecraft:impaling",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:loyalty",lvl:3s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:11,Operation:0,UUID:[I;1084287444,880756443,-1103901261,-1570968330],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Amount:-2.4,Operation:0,UUID:[I;-157665381,-458731836,-1344740782,214062577],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
